professional_summary: Self-motivated, innovative and goal-oriented Industrial Engineer, Project Manager and Team Leader dedicated to boosting company revenue through exceptional leadership and rigorous cost and schedule control techniques. Experienced in process improvement and efficiency optimization.

work_experience.description: Lead Industrial Engineering team supporting 737 Wing Seal, Test, Paint and Systems Installation build processes
responsibilities: Managed Industrial Engineering team achieving $1.5M in cost savings
Led team in production scheduling and shop operating rhythm
Tracked metrics and managed major shop recoveries
Supported manufacturing Senior Managers in Rate and MAX readiness projects
Managed recurring and nonrecurring statement of work

work_experience.description: Managed Sine Wave Fab-Cell statement of work for 787-9 implementation
responsibilities: Negotiated priorities and schedule in DIE exercises with cross functional team
Developed cost estimates for division and program
Led Green Rooms for production management
Analyzed value stream including capabilities and capacity
